abstract: Publicis has decided to buy a search marketing services provider from U.S. search engine group Google as part of its push into digital advertising, the French advertising company said on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Publicis has decided to buy a search marketing services provider from U.S. search engine group Google as part of its push into digital advertising, the French advertising company said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Publicis to Buy Search Marketing Unit From Google
